CustomField.description:
This field will house the target you wish to display in the "target" on the <a> tag. Please note: values from the following link are valid markup:
https://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_a_target.asp
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
This field will house the target you wish to display in the "target" on the <a> tag. Please note: values from the following link are valid markup:
https://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_a_target.asp
CustomField.label: Target
